DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy ALKS 5461 administer daily 4 week adults Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) inadequate response antidepressant therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate ALKS 5461 Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.detailed_description: The study measure efficacy use HAM-D-17 , MADRS , CGI-S well use scale assessment .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed major depressive episode ( MDE ) Body mass index less equal 40 kg/m2 Have treat adequate dose SSRI/SNRI current MDE least 8 week , , adequate dose last 4 week expect remain stable throughout study History inadequate response entire current MDE 1 2 adequate antidepressant treatment , include current treatment Be otherwise physically healthy Have axis I diagnosis delirium , dementia , amnestic cognitive disorder , schizophrenia psychotic disorder , bipolar I II disorder , eat disorder , obsessivecompulsive disorder , panic disorder , acute stress disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder Have clinically significant current axis II diagnosis borderline , antisocial , paranoid , schizoid , schizotypal , histrionic personality disorder Are experience hallucination , delusion , psychotic symptomatology current MDE Receive new onset psychotherapy within 6 week screen Use opioid agonist ( eg , codeine , oxycodone , morphine ) within 14 day screen Have receive electroconvulsive therapy current MDE Have attempt suicide within past 2 year Have thyroid pathology Have history seizure disorder neuroleptic malignant syndrome/serotonin syndrome Have positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Additional inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
